channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Upload Restriction -- WP Upload Restriction
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Upload Restriction -- WP Upload Restriction

item.title: CVE-2021-34626|2024-09-16T16:58:03.185Z -- wp%20upload%20restriction -- wp%20upload%20restriction
item.description: A vulnerability in the deleteCustomType function of the WP Upload Restriction WordPress plugin allows low-level authenticated users to delete custom extensions added by administrators. This issue affects versions 2.2.3 and prior.

item.title: CVE-2021-34625|2024-09-16T18:56:07.715Z -- wp%20upload%20restriction -- wp%20upload%20restriction
item.description: A vulnerability in the saveCustomType function of the WP Upload Restriction WordPress plugin allows low-level authenticated users to inject arbitrary web scripts. This issue affects versions 2.2.3 and prior.

item.title: CVE-2021-34627|2024-09-16T18:54:22.361Z -- wp%20upload%20restriction -- wp%20upload%20restriction
item.description: A vulnerability in the getSelectedMimeTypesByRole function of the WP Upload Restriction WordPress plugin allows low-level authenticated users to view custom extensions added by administrators. This issue affects versions 2.2.3 and prior.
